title: Hearings List
description: Comprehensive list view of all scheduled hearings with filtering and search capabilities
quickStart: View all scheduled hearings in chronological order
Use search to find specific case hearings
Apply filters by court, judge, or hearing type
Click any hearing to view or edit details

interactiveElements.name: Search Bar
interactiveElements.purpose: Find hearings by case number, court, or judge name
interactiveElements.example: Search 'GST-2024-001' to find all hearings for that case

interactiveElements.name: Filter Options
interactiveElements.purpose: Narrow down hearings by specific criteria
interactiveElements.example: Filter by 'High Court' to see only appellate hearings

interactiveElements.name: Hearing Actions
interactiveElements.purpose: Quick actions for each hearing (View, Edit, Cancel)
interactiveElements.example: Click 'Edit' to reschedule or update hearing details

interactiveElements.name: Status Indicators
interactiveElements.purpose: Visual status of hearing preparation and outcomes
interactiveElements.example: Green indicates completed hearings, amber shows pending preparation

philosophy.title: Organized Scheduling
philosophy.description: A clear list view enables efficient hearing management and prevents scheduling conflicts

examples.solution: Filter hearings for next 7 days and check preparation status
examples.benefit: Proactive preparation and no missed hearings

examples.solution: Filter by specific court to batch prepare similar hearings
